descriptionHtml:
I have remade the mod as i discovered I damaged navmesh in riverwood, New one shouldn't cause problems and using new resources as well. 
 Changed riverwood only a little compared to old one, only lights for now and whiterun. More will come soon, just been busy also enjoy and don't be afraid to suggest some ideas for the mod there are no bad ideas. (No not really lore friendly, so no one post about it being not lore friendly!!!!)

Also if anyone wants partner up on this mod let me know, I normal work on mods once a week for a hour or two.

 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UDx0Aes0tqk

My Patreon!!! https://www.patreon.com/user?u=182435 

Resources used in new one (note might of not used one of these resourced can't remember now)
credit: Dwemer Shaded Solid Pipes by [b]Impulseman45
[/b]Strotis Ovens Resource by [b]Stroti and Tamira
[/b]OpenBooks Resource by [b]Blary
[/b]FoodContainer Resource by [b]Blary[/b]
Modders Resource Pack by [b]Oaristys and Tony67[/b]



Old version resources
credits: Vicn Creature Resources by Vicn, I used a skin for a weak summon i hidden in riverwood.
Ingredients Drawer Resource by Blary used cause it felt right to me.
Tueffels Misc Resources by Tueffel, used some of these resources.


Windhelm Industrialized by CouriersGambit, For inspiring me to do this never thought i would do it till i saw his mod.

Ruiuji for making a video, this a good day for me.
author: dudeinmask
